TableField.name: ManagedChangeID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|A combined field used to describe this managed change when associating it with other records

TableField.name: ChangeGuidelineID
TableField.phrase: Change Guideline|The change guideline used to guide this change

ForeignField.name: PolicyOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization responsible for issuing the change management guideline

ForeignField.name: PolicyOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization responsible for issuing the change management guideline

ForeignField.name: PolicyPersonAccountableID
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for providing oversight and support for the change management guideline

ForeignField.name: PolicyPersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for providing oversight and support for the change management guideline

ForeignField.name: ChangeCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Change Category|The category of change requiring management

CodeField.name: ChangeCategory
CodeField.phrase: Change Category|The category of change requiring management

ForeignField.name: ChangeGuideline
ForeignField.phrase: Change Guideline|The change guideline used to guide this change

TableField.name: ManagedChangeTitle
TableField.phrase: Change Title|A short, descriptive, title for the change to be managed

ForeignField.name: TypeScope
ForeignField.phrase: Scope Guidance|A detailed description of the scope of the change guideline
ForeignField.sample: Adding new employees shall include a complete review of the job duties and a hazard analysis of the tasks to be performed by the incumbent employee. New employees must also be medically qualified for the work

TableField.name: Scope
TableField.phrase: Scope|A detailed description of the scope of the change
TableField.sample: This change involves the addition of a single employee based on a new job description. The change evaluation will be a thorough and complete.

ForeignField.name: TypeDegree
ForeignField.phrase: Degree Guidance|A detailed description of the degree of the change guideline
ForeignField.sample: The addition of new employees requires a thorough review of the employee's background and prior work experience.

TableField.name: Degree
TableField.phrase: Degree|A detailed description of the degree of the change
TableField.sample: A thorough review of the employee's background and prior work experience will be performed.

ForeignField.name: TypeDesignConsiderations
ForeignField.phrase: Design Guidance|A detailed description of the design considerations to be made as a result of the change guideline
ForeignField.sample: New employee assignments should involve a review of work process and task design.

TableField.name: DesignConsiderations
TableField.phrase: Design|A detailed description of the design considerations to be made as a result of the change
TableField.sample: A thorough review of the work process and task design will be conducted.

ForeignField.name: TypeConstructionConsiderations
ForeignField.phrase: Construction Guidance|A detailed description of the construction considerations to be made as a result of the change guideline
ForeignField.sample: New employees may require work area modifications to accomodate disabilities. Consideration should be given to any feedback received by the industrial medical provider regarding necessary workplace design accomodations.

TableField.name: ConstructionConsiderations
TableField.phrase: Construction|A detailed description of the construction considerations to be made as a result of the change
TableField.sample: A thorough review of the work area will be performed to address any modifications to required to accomodate disabilities identified during the employee's pre-employment physical examination.

ForeignField.name: TypeOperationalConsiderations
ForeignField.phrase: Operational Guidance|A detailed description of the operational considerations to be made as a result of the change guideline
ForeignField.sample: Thorough discussions shall be held with all departments affected by the addition of a new empoyee. Every effort should be made to hire employees with prior experience with all required operational equipment.

TableField.name: OperationalConsiderations
TableField.phrase: Operations|A detailed description of the operational considerations to be made as a result of the change
TableField.sample: A thorough department consultation will be performed and every efffort will be extended to the most experienced applicant. All department will be required to affirm a candidate before an offer to hire is extended

ForeignField.name: TypeMaintenanceConsiderations
ForeignField.phrase: Maintenance Guidance|A detailed description of the maintenance considerations to be made as a result of the change guideline
ForeignField.sample: Consideration shall be given for the requirements to maintain or retain an employee before extending an offer of employment. Employees represent a substantial investment and retention is imperative. Consideration shall be given to the specific requirements to maintain a positive employment relationship and retain an employee on an employee-by-employee basis.

TableField.name: MaintenanceConsiderations
TableField.phrase: Maintenance|A detailed description of the maintenance considerations to be made as a result of the change
TableField.sample: A thorough evaluation will be made as to the retain the candidate during the interview process but before extending an offer of employment.

ForeignField.name: TypeDecommissionConsiderations
ForeignField.phrase: Decommission Guidance|A detailed description of the decommissioning considerations to be made as a result of the change guideline
ForeignField.sample: Consideration shall be given to the costs and impact of ending the employment relationship before extending an offer of employment.

TableField.name: DecommissionConsiderations
TableField.phrase: Decommission|A detailed description of the decommissioning considerations to be made as a result of the change
TableField.sample: Consideration of the costs associated with ending the employment have been made prior to extending an offer of employment.

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The organization affected by, and responsible for, the managed change

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization affected by, and responsible for, the managed change

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for providing oversight and support for the managed change

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for providing oversight and support for the managed change

RemoteField.name: BeginDate
RemoteField.phrase: Begin Date|The date the managed change began

RemoteField.name: CompletionDate
RemoteField.phrase: Completion Date|Date the managed change was completed

TableField.name: ManagedChangeStatusID
TableField.phrase: Status|The present status of the managed change

CodeField.name: ManagedChangeStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|The present status of the managed change

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the managed change

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the managed change

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: ManagedChange
CombinedField.phrase: Managed Change|A combined field used to describe the managed change when associating it with other records

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Barriers to success
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Data Collection
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data collection methods, locations, and resources should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about collecting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data input methods, permissions, and requirements should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about inputting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about organizational considerations associated with the subject matter of this module. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about common practices associated with the subject matter of this module and opportunities for change enabled by the Active Agenda project. DocumentationSection.title: Applying Knowledge
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge application methods should be entered here. DocumentationSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific questions that are frequently asked of administrators or implementers should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see the types of questions collected, and answers provided, by the Active Agenda community relating to the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
